channel.title: Urgent Help Please ( Banning certain letters)
channel.description:
Ive got someone on my server who keeps spamming advertising their server and they have copied my mods name and put a ~ infromt of it so i cant ban him on game.
Is there any way of stopping people from using that character so then he could be banned in game ?
Thnx Brendan

item.title: Urgent Help Please ( Banning certain letters)
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

[quote=“Projeckt Revolution, post:2, topic:189902”]You go into “misc.java”

And where you see something similar to this:

a , b , c , d

Thnx v much

Brendan

etc…

Those are all the characters that are useable. So just leave the ones that you want (Numbers & Letters would be your best bet)[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Urgent Help Please ( Banning certain letters)

item.title: Urgent Help Please ( Banning certain letters)
item.dc:creator: @Simonrofl Simonrofl
item.description:
@Simonrofl wrote:

Search public void run and find the useable letters and change them.

Projeckt revolution that just makes them not allowed to be said in chatbox.

Read full topic
item.source: Urgent Help Please ( Banning certain letters)

item.title: Urgent Help Please ( Banning certain letters)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You go into “misc.java”

And where you see something similar to this:

a , b , c , d

etc…

Those are all the characters that are useable. So just leave the ones that you want (Numbers & Letters would be your best bet)
